explicit

Class CTMCModelChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.StateModelChecker
        • explicit.NonProbModelChecker
          • explicit.ProbModelChecker
            • explicit.CTMCModelChecker

  • public class CTMCModelChecker
extends ProbModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov chains (CTMCs).

        protected StateValues checkExistsLTL(Model model,
                                     Expression expr,
                                     java.util.BitSet statesOfInterest)
                              throws PrismException
        Description copied from class: NonProbModelChecker
        Compute the set of states satisfying E[ phi ] for an LTL formula phi. The LTL formula can have nested P or R operators, as well as nested CTL formulas.
        Overrides:
        checkExistsLTL in class NonProbModelChecker
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        expr - the LTL formula
        Returns:
        a boolean StateValues, with true for all states satisfying E[ phi ]
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(CTMC ctmc,
                               double time)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Start from initial state (or uniform distribution over multiple initial states).
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(CTMC ctmc,
                               double t,
                               java.io.File initDistFile)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Optionally, use the passed in file initDistFile to give the initial probability distribution (time 0). If null, start from initial state (or uniform distribution over multiple initial states).
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        t - Time point
        initDistFile - File containing initial distribution
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(CTMC ctmc,
                               double t,
                               StateValues initDist)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Optionally, use the passed in vector initDist as the initial probability distribution (time 0). If null, start from initial state (or uniform distribution over multiple initial states). For reasons of efficiency, when a vector is passed in, it will be trampled over, so if you wanted it, take a copy.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        t - Time point
        initDist - Initial distribution (will be overwritten)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeUntilProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeUntilProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                            java.util.BitSet remain,
                                            java.util.BitSet target)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute until probabilities. i.e. compute the probability of reaching a state in target, while remaining in those in @{code remain}.
        Parameters:
        dtmc - The CTMC
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeReachProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                            java.util.BitSet remain,
                                            java.util.BitSet target,
                                            double[] init,
                                            java.util.BitSet known)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute reachability/until probabilities. i.e. compute the probability of reaching a state in target, while remaining in those in @{code remain}.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (may be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTimeBoundedReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeTimeBoundedReachProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                                       java.util.BitSet target,
                                                       double t)
                                                throws PrismException
        Compute time-bounded reachability probabilities, i.e. compute the probability of reaching a state in target within time t.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        target - Target states
        t - Time bound
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTimeBoundedUntilProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeTimeBoundedUntilProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                                       java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                       java.util.BitSet target,
                                                       double t)
                                                throws PrismException
        Compute time-bounded until probabilities, i.e. compute the probability of reaching a state in target, within time t, and while remaining in states in remain.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        t - Time bound
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTransientBackwardsProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeTransientBackwardsProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                                         java.util.BitSet target,
                                                         java.util.BitSet nonAbs,
                                                         double t,
                                                         double[] multProbs)
                                                  throws PrismException
        Perform transient probability computation, as required for (e.g. CSL) model checking. Compute, for each state, the sum over target states of the probability of being in that state at time t multiplied by the corresponding probability in the vector multProbs, assuming that all states *not* in nonAbs are made absorbing. If multProbs is null, it is assumed to be all 1s.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        target - Target states
        nonAbs - States *not* to be made absorbing (optional: null means "all")
        t - Time bound
        multProbs - Multiplication vector (optional: null means all 1s)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeCumulativeRewards

        public ModelCheckerResult computeCumulativeRewards(CTMC ctmc,
                                                   MCRewards mcRewards,
                                                   double t)
                                            throws PrismException
        Perform cumulative reward computation. Compute, for each state of , the expected rewards accumulated until t when starting in this state and using reward structure mcRewards.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        mcRewards - The rewards
        t - Time bound
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTransientProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeTransientProbs(CTMC ctmc,
                                                double t,
                                                double[] initDist)
                                         throws PrismException
        Compute transient probabilities. i.e. compute the probability of being in each state at time t, assuming the initial distribution initDist. For space efficiency, the initial distribution vector will be modified and values over-written, so if you wanted it, take a copy.
        Parameters:
        ctmc - The CTMC
        t - Time point
        initDist - Initial distribution (will be overwritten)
        Throws:
        PrismException
